msbt.message: I wasn't expecting a card from anyone so soon after I moved in. And a present too! You're really something. I wouldn't want to leave you hanging, so here's a card back and a present of my own.

Settling in to a new place can be tough, but your letter (and the gift too!) made it way easier. That was real cool of you to do for someone you barely know. So let's fix that and get to know each other better!

Whew, you had me going. I thought I had gotten one of those cut-and- paste callouts first thing on moving here. (Wouldn't be the first time.) But it was way cooler than that! Thanks for the pick-me-up!
There's a lot I haven't gotten used to on this island, and I'll have to add how friendly my new neighbors are to the list! If everyone here is as chill as you, I think I'm gonna have a good time!

Thanks a bucketload for sending me a welcome card! That's the kind of passionate spirit I was hoping to find in my new neighbors, and I'm liking what I'm seeing so far. Can't wait to get to know you better!

It was real nice of you to send me that card! I've just moved in and I already feel like I've made a friend. I can be a little rough around the edges, but don't let that throw you. I can be nice too, sometimes! Ha!
